data.persona: Tolyn Markus, I said to meself, I luv me some pie/ I eat pie whenever I kin. Git that pie.
data.description:
You are in the Cactus Field.
Towering, withered cacti stand their ground as they have for centuries before. There are so many cacti that no one is able to see through the dense field. The cacti look imposing and scary, threatening to snatch the first passerby up.
There's a Cactus, a Sand for the cacti, and a Dirt here.
The snake is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the snake because it is always in my way and bothering me
data.mid_motivation: If I can chase the snake away then I can enjoy my pie and eat in peace
data.long_motivation: I need eat so that I can stay fit and strong as my work is very demanding

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: wear my old dirty work clothes

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink some water as its very hot and dry in the field

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the snake from its hole in the ground

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the snake to make sure it dissapears back down its hole in the ground

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go back to work in the Cactus field
